Package controller

Contains the interface between WebServer endpoints and the back end services, auth and storage.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthConfig
    Defines a configuration for authentication service including the type of service, the hashing algorithm, and the string encoding
    ServiceController
    Interface between WebServer endpoints and back end services (auth and storage)
    ServiceFactory
    Creates an instance of a ServiceController based on any combination of AuthConfig and StorageConfig, or a ServiceConfig which contains both AuthConfig and StorageConfig as well as other server params
    StorageConfig
    Defines a configuration for a storage service, including any urls, storage name, and type
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthConfig.AuthType
    Enumerates the supported authentication types, currently only HTTPBASIC
    StorageConfig.StorageType
    Defines implemented StorageType, currently includes StorageType.MEMORY and StorageType.MONGO
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HTTPException
    An exception that gets passed to the web server and sent as a response via one of the endpoints if something goes wrong.

Package controller Description

Contains the interface between WebServer endpoints and the back end services, auth and storage.
